div.head: 毒蛇傷人
div.div: harm caused to a person by poisonous snakes

bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

entry.def: harm caused to a person by poisonous snakes

sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with she hui du 蛇虺毒② , venomous snake poisoning. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Bai bing zhu zhi yao 百病主治藥：甘草，毒蛇傷人，目黑口噤，毒氣入 腹，同白礬末，冷水服二錢 , “For harm caused to a person by poisonous snakes , when the eyes are black and the jaws are clenched, with poison qi entering the abdomen, prepare a powder of gan cao with bai fan and ingest 2 qian with cold water”.
